humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, sentinel lymph nodes 1 to 4 from the right axilla were excised and examined. The report specifically mentions 'Negative for metastases (0/1)' for each of the lymph nodes. This indicates that there are no metastatic carcinomas found in any of the assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/4.' This indicates that no metastases were found in the sentinel lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
